code: import React from'react';import{withRouter}from'react-router';class ScrollToTop extends React.Component{componentDidUpdate(prevProps){if(this.props.location.pathname!==prevProps.location.pathname){window.scrollTo(0,0);if(window.$!==undefined){const page=window.$('#root').length?window.$('#root'):window.$('#app').length?window.$('#app'):null;if(page){page.animate({scrollTop:0},100);}}}}render(){return this.props.children;}}export default withRouter(ScrollToTop);
